db.query: Date could not have been exchanged with the server.
db.connection: Cannot establish a connection to exchange data.
db.transaction: There was a problem during operation execution.

concurrency.resource_modified: Resource was modified in the meantime.

account.motto_too_long: Motto must be shorter than 128 characters.
account.email_too_long: Email must be shorter than 254 characters.
account.wrong_firstname: First name has to consist only of letters and must be shorter than 16 characters.
account.wrong_lastname: Last name has to consist only of letters and must be shorter than 32 characters.
account.wrong_password: Password cannot consist of white characters.
account.wrong_email: Email has to be in correct format and cannot consist of white characters.
account.wrong_account: Given account does not belong to logged user.
account.login_info_wrong_ip_address: User ip address is not valid.

access_level.not_granted: This user does not have that access level.

offer.not_found: Offer not found. Wrong id or offer has been removed.

has_applications.delete: Offer cannot be deleted because it already has applications.
has_applications.edit: Offer cannot be edited because it already has applications.
has_applications.assign_starship: Starship cannot be assigned because offer has applications.

offer.incorrect_dates_order: Flight's start date must precede end date.
offer.incorrect_start_date: Given flight's start date is not correct.
offer.incorrect_end_date: Given flight's end date is not correct.
offer.incorrect_total_cost: Given total cost is not correct.
offer.incorrect_total_weight: Given total weight is not correct.
offer.delete_is_not_hidden: Cannot delete offer that is not hidden.
offer.delete_is_open: Cannot delete offer that is open.
offer.incorrect_starship_id: Given starship id is not correct.
offer.incorrect_starship_status: Choosen starship is no longer operational.
offer.overlapping_offer: Given time period for chosen starship overlaps with existing offer.

change_password.password_is_the_same: New password must not be the same as the old one.
change_password.cant_change_own_password: You can't change your own password this way.
change_password.forbidden_email: Operation failed. You have tried to change other user's password. This may be a session error.
change_password.old_password_too_short: Old password must be at least 8 characters long.
change_password.new_password_too_short: New password must be at least 8 characters long.

transaction.repeated_transaction_rollback: Operation couldn't have been completed despite multiple retires.

captcha.cant_access_validation_server: Error connecting to reCaptcha validation server.

filterPhrase.too_long: Phrase must be shorter than 32 characters.

name.too_long: Name must be shorter than 32 characters.
name.too_short: Name must contain at least 1 character.

starship.assigned: Cannot edit starship that is assigned to offer.
starship.assigned_self: This starship is already assigned to this offer.
starship.already_assigned: Starship is assigned to another offer at given time period.
starship.not_found: Starship with such an id doesn't exist.

application.examination_code_too_long: Examination code must be shorter than 1024 characters.
application.offer_changed: The offer you try to apply to have changed in a meantime.
application.offer_closed: The offer you try to apply to is not accepting applications at the time.
application.already_applied: You have already applied for this offer.

review.already_exists: The application has already been reviewed.
review.weight_limit_exceeded: Can't comply - weight limit would be exceeded.
review.application_changed: Application has changed - please verify again.
